title: IRefPlaneFeatureData.ProjectionType
description: Gets or sets the projection type for this on-surface reference plane feature.
returns: Type of a plane on a surface as defined in swOnSurfacePlaneProjectType_e
remarks:
IMPORTANT:
Reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2010 or later are constraint based; reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2009 or earlier are not. See the
Remarks
section in the
IRefPlaneFeatureData interface
topic for details about reference planes and this interface.
